Tavatron grunted in defiance:

"A warrior does not surrender so readily!" Tavatron leaned her head back and 
looked straight at Dinobot's optics. She fired her optic lasers at his face, 
point blank range.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sat, 15 Apr 2000 17:45:53 PDT
>
>* Dinobot snarled into Tavatron's face, he'd felt her blade cut his leg but
>it was nothing more then a scratch.
>He kept his balance as she kicked at him and used his tail to bind her legs
>together so she could kick no more.
>He squeezed even harder, but stopped for fear of crushing her spine. This
>was practice, he didn't want to force her into a struggle for life and
>death.
>Dinobot thought that he would give her a chance to give up before he was
>forced to damage her and cause mech fluid to flow.*
>
>" Surrender or sustain more damage!"
>
>* He waited for a reply, he WOULD hurt her if she chose to continue.
>Part of being a warrior was learning how to take pain!*
>
